:py:mod:`SNEWS_PT.test.snews_pt_test_suite`
===========================================

.. py:module:: SNEWS_PT.test.snews_pt_test_suite

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Taken from snewpy



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   SNEWS_PT.test.snews_pt_test_suite.snews_pt_test_suite
   SNEWS_PT.test.snews_pt_test_suite.runtests



.. py:function:: snews_pt_test_suite()

   Returns unittest.TestSuite of desiutil tests.
      This is factored out separately from runtests() so that it can be used by
   ``python setup.py test``.


.. py:function:: runtests()

   Run all tests in snewpy.test.test_*.
